TEXT.English: When checked, shows debugging information in the combat odds calculations.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows debugging information in the combat odds calculations.
TEXT.German: Zeigt Debug-Information bei der Berechnung der Siegchancen an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra le informazioni di debug nel calcolo delle Probabilità di Combattimento.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando está activada muestra la información de depuración en el cálculo de Probabilidades de Combate.

TEXT.English: When checked, PieceOfMind's ACO shows more detailed combat odds information when you hover over a unit to attack.
TEXT.French: When checked, PieceOfMind's ACO shows more detailed combat odds information when you hover over a unit to attack.
TEXT.German: Zeigt detailliertere Informationen zur Berechnung der Siegchancen an, wenn der Mauszeiger für einen Angriff über eine feindliche Einheit bewegt wird (verwendet PieceOfMind's "Advanced Combat Odds (ACO)"-Mod)
TEXT.Italian: When checked, PieceOfMind's ACO shows more detailed combat odds information when you hover over a unit to attack.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando está activada, PCA de PieceOfMind muestra información más detallada de probabilidades de combate cuando pasas el mouse sobre una unidad a atacar.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the original odds in addition to ACO's.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the original odds in addition to ACO's.
TEXT.German: Zeigt zusätzlich zur ACO-Ansicht die originale Siegchancen-Berechnung
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows the original odds in addition to ACO's.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando está habilitada muestra las probabilidades originales, en adición a las de PCA.

TEXT.English: When checked, ignores any free wins versus barbarians you have left due to the difficulty level.
TEXT.French: When checked, ignores any free wins versus barbarians you have left due to the difficulty level.
TEXT.German: Ignoriert alle verbleibenden sicheren Einheiten-Siege über Barbaren, die auf Grund des Schwierigkeitsgrades gewährt werden
TEXT.Italian: When checked, ignores any free wins versus barbarians you have left due to the difficulty level.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando está habilitada, ignora cualquier victoria gratuita contra bárbaros debida al nivel de dificultad.

TEXT.English: When checked, merges the bars of probabilities that are less than half of one percent.
TEXT.French: When checked, merges the bars of probabilities that are less than half of one percent.
TEXT.German: Fasst Wahrscheinlichkeitsbalken zusammen, die weniger als ein halbes Prozent anzeigen
TEXT.Italian: When checked, merges the bars of probabilities that are less than half of one percent.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando está habilitada, combina las barras de probabilidades que son menores que la mitad de uno por ciento.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the probability bars of each possible ending health for the attacker.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the probability bars of each possible ending health for the attacker.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die Wahrscheinlichkeitsbalken für die jeweils erwartete Gesundheit des Angreifers nach dem Kampf angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the probability bars of each possible ending health for the attacker.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar las barras de probabilidad de cada posible nivel final de salud del atacante.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the attacking unit's information.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the attacking unit's information.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die Informationen über die angereifende Einheit angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the attacking unit's information.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar la información de la unidad atacante.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the average (expected) health each unit will have after the battle.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the average (expected) health each unit will have after the battle.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die durchschnittliche (erwartete) Gesundheit jeder Einheit nach dem Kampf angezeigt wird
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the average (expected) health each unit will have after the battle.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar el promedio (esperado) de salud que tendrá cada unidad después de la batalla.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the basic odds information.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the basic odds information.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die grundlegenden Informationen zur Berechnung der Siegchancen angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the basic odds information.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar la información de probabilidades básicas.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the probability bars of each possible ending health for the defender.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the probability bars of each possible ending health for the defender.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die Wahrscheinlichkeitsbalken für die jeweils erwartete Gesundheit des Verteidigers nach dem Kampf angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the probability bars of each possible ending health for the defender.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar las barras de probabilidad de cada posible nivel final de salud del defensor.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the defending unit's information.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the defending unit's information.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die Informationen über die verteidigende Einheit angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the defending unit's information.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar la información de la unidad defensora.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the defence modifiers.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the defence modifiers.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die Verteidigungsmodifikatoren angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the defence modifiers.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar los modificadores defensivos.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the R values on either side of the actual value that will produce +/- 1 XP.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the R values on either side of the actual value that will produce +/- 1 XP.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die R-Werte, die +/- 1 EP ausmachen können, auf beiden Seiten des tatsächlichen Wertes angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the R values on either side of the actual value that will produce +/- 1 XP.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar los valores R en cada lado del valor actual que producirá +/- 1 XP.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays "attacker" and "defender" labels before each non-empty set of modifiers.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays "attacker" and "defender" labels before each non-empty set of modifiers.
TEXT.German: Kennzeichnet, falls vorhanden, die jeweilige Gruppe der kampfrelevanten Modifikatoren der Einheiten mit "Angreifer" und "Verteidiger"
TEXT.Italian: When checked, displays "attacker" and "defender" labels before each non-empty set of modifiers.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando está habilitado, muestra las etiquetas "atacante" y "defensor" antes de cada set de modificadores que no esté vacío.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the instructions for pressing [SHIFT] to see the alternate view.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the instructions for pressing [SHIFT] to see the alternate view.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann der Hinweis zum Drücken der [UMSCHALT]-Taste für den Wechsel zur alternativen Ansicht angezeigt wird
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the instructions for pressing [SHIFT] to see the alternate view.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar las instrucciones para presionar [MAYÚS] para mostrar la vista alternativa.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the odds that each unit will survive.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the odds that each unit will survive.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die Überlebenschancen für jede Einheit angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the odds that each unit will survive.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar las probabilidades de supervivencia de cada unidad.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the total Defence modifiers (includes attacker's non-combat modifiers that apply to the defender).
TEXT.French: Select when to show the total Defence modifiers (includes attacker's non-combat modifiers that apply to the defender).
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann der absolute Verteidigungsmodifikator angezeigt wird (beinhaltet die nicht kampfrelevanten Modifikatoren des Angreifers, die auf den Verteidiger angewendet werden)
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the total Defence modifiers (includes attacker's non-combat modifiers that apply to the defender).
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar los modificadores defensivos totales (incluyendo los no-de-combate del atacante que se aplican al defensor).

TEXT.English: Select when to show the odds that each unit will survive without taking any damage.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the odds that each unit will survive without taking any damage.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die Chancen angezeigt werden, dass jede Einheit den Kampf ohne Schaden überleben wird
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the odds that each unit will survive without taking any damage.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar las probabilidades para cada unidad de sobrevivir sin sufrir daños.

TEXT.English: Select when to show the unrounded XP values in addition to the actual rounded values the units will gain.
TEXT.French: Select when to show the unrounded XP values in addition to the actual rounded values the units will gain.
TEXT.German: Bestimmt, wann die ungerundeten Erfahrungspunkte zusätzlich zu den tatsächlichen (gerundeten) Erfahrungspunkten, die die Einheiten erhalten werden, angezeigt werden
TEXT.Italian: Select when to show the unrounded XP values in addition to the actual rounded values the units will gain.
TEXT.Spanish: Selecciona cuándo mostrar los valores no redondeados de XP además de los redondeados que las unidades ganarán.

TEXT.English: When checked, swaps the normal and alternate views.
TEXT.French: When checked, swaps the normal and alternate views.
TEXT.German: Wechselt zwischen normaler und alternativer Ansicht
TEXT.Italian: When checked, swaps the normal and alternate views.
TEXT.Spanish: Cuando está habilitada intercambia la vista normal y la alternativa.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Grundproduktion (ohne Überschuss, Zwangsarbeit und Waldrodung) zusätzlich zur Produktion der derzeitigen Runde an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la produzione base (escluse le quote da surplus, sacrifici e abbattimento alberi) come aggiunta alla produzione del turno corrente.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la producción base (excluyendo excedentes, sacrificios y tala) además de la producción del turno actual.

TEXT.English: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.
TEXT.French: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger bei gedrückter [STRG]-Taste über eine Stadt bewegt wird, die Basiswerte (ohne Modifikatoren) der folgenden Güter an: Produktion, Handel, Wirtschaft, Unterhalt, Große Persönlichkeiten
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, tenendo premuto CTRL mentre si posiziona il cursore su un oggetto ne mostra i valori base (privi di modificatori) di produzione, oro, commercio, mantenimento, grandi personaggi.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, mantener Ctrl mientras se mantiene el ratón sobre un valor mostrará el valor sin modificaciones para la mayoría de valores: producción, comercio, oro, mantenimiento, grandes personas.

TEXT.English: When checked and a city is constructing a building, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], and [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] it will produce are displayed.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die effektiven Erträge von [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY] und [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] eines Gebäudes an, das gerade errichtet wird

TEXT.English: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.
TEXT.French: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Liste der Gebäude mit Symbolen statt Text an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, la lista degli edifici viene visualizzata con le rispettive icone invece dei nomi.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, se muestra la lista de edificios empleando iconos en lugar de nombres.

TEXT.English: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.French: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt das gesamte Wirtschaftseinkommen ([ICON_COMMERCE]) vor den einzelnen Einkommensarten ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE] und [ICON_ESPIONAGE]) an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra l'oro totale ([ICON_COMMERCE]) prima dei singoli tipi ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], e [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra el comercio total ([ICON_COMMERCE]) delante de cada uno de los tipos de comercio individuales ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], y [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der Runden an, bis sich die Kulturgrenzen ([ICON_CULTURE]) einer Stadt erweitern
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di turni mancanti per la successiva espansione culturale ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra el número de turnos restantes para que los bordes de la ciudad se expandan debido a su cultura ([ICON_CULTURE]).

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der wegen Zwangsrekrutierung unzufriedenen Bürger ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden an, bis diese sich wieder beruhigt haben
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la cantidad de población enfadada ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) debido al reclutamiento y el número de turnos restantes de la misma.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).
TEXT.German: Zeigt detailliertere Informationen über das Wachstum einer Stadt an (Zunahme, Abnahme, Hungersnot, Stagnation).
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra più dettagli sulla crescita (crescita, decrescita, carestia, stagnazione).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra información detallada sobre el crecimiento (creciendo, reduciéndose, hambruna, detenido).

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der Runden an, bis eine Stadt eine Große Persönlichkeit ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) hervorbringt
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di turni necessario perchè la città generi il successivo Grande Personaggio([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra el número de turnos restantes para que en la ciudad nazca una gran personaje ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die derzeitige Zufriedenheit ([ICON_HAPPY] oder [ICON_UNHAPPY]) einer Stadt an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la felicità risultante ([ICON_HAPPY] o [ICON_UNHAPPY]) per la città.
TEXT.Spanish: Permite mostrar los iconos de felicidad ([ICON_HAPPY] o [ICON_UNHAPPY]) para la ciudad.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die derzeitige Gesundheit ([ICON_HEALTHY] oder [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) einer Stadt an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la salute risultante([ICON_HEALTHY] o [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) per la città.
TEXT.Spanish: Permite mostrar los iconos de salud ([ICON_HEALTHY] o [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) para la ciudad.

TEXT.English: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
TEXT.French: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
TEXT.German: Verbirgt die Hinweise zur Auswahl von Städten und zur Anzeige der Basiswerte, um Platz für die neuen Informationen zu schaffen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nasconde le istruzioni per la selezione delle Città e mostra i valori base per fare posto alle nuove informazioni.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, se ocultan las instrucciones para seleccionar ciudades y mostrar valores base para hacer sitio a más información.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Anzahl der wegen Zwangsarbeit unzufriedenen Bürger ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) und die Anzahl der verbleibenden Runden an, bis diese sich wieder beruhigt haben
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il numero di cittadini adirati ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) a causa dei sacrifici ed il numero di turni prima che si pacifichino.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra la cantidad de población enfadada ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) debido al sacrificio y el número de turnos restantes de la misma.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Kosten ([ICON_CITIZEN] oder [ICON_GOLD]) und Überschüsse ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und [ICON_GOLD]) einer Beschleunigung (Zwangsarbeit und/oder Kauf) der derzeitigen Produktion an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra il costo ([ICON_CITIZEN] o [ICON_GOLD]) ed il surplus ([ICON_PRODUCTION] e [ICON_GOLD]) per l'accelerazione (da sacrifici e/o pagamenti) per l'oggetto in produzione.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra el coste ([ICON_CITIZEN] o [ICON_GOLD]) y excedente ([ICON_PRODUCTION] y [ICON_GOLD]) por apresurar (sacrificio y/o compra) la producción actual.

TEXT.English: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.
TEXT.French: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.
TEXT.German: Bezieht [ICON_PRODUCTION] einer Stadt aus der aktuellen Runde in die Berechnung des Produktionsüberschusses ([ICON_PRODUCTION] und/oder [ICON_GOLD]) ein, der aus der Produktionsbeschleunigung durch Zwangsarbeit entsteht
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, include il turno corrente quando calcola il surplus ([ICON_PRODUCTION] e/o [ICON_GOLD]) per l'accelerazione da sacrifici.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, incluye la producción del turno actual cuando se calcule el excedente ([ICON_PRODUCTION] y/o [ICON_GOLD]) de apresurar construcción mediante sacrificio.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Wahrscheinlichkeit an, dass in einer Stadt auf Grund von kulturellem Druck Unruhen ausbrechen
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra la probabilità che la Città si rivolti a causa della pressione culturale.
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra las probabilidades de que tenga lugar una revuelta en la ciudad debido a la presión cultural.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).
TEXT.French: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).
TEXT.German: Zeigt Symbole für die Spezialisten einer Stadt ab (sowohl für Bürger als auch für niedergelassene Große Persönlichkeiten)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra delle icone per gli Specialisti in città (sia i Cittadini Specialisti che i Grandi Personaggi trasformati in Super-Specialisti).
TEXT.Spanish: Si se activa, muestra iconos para los especialistas de la ciudad (tanto ciudadanos como grandes personajes).

TEXT.English: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.
TEXT.German: Zeigt eine Aufschlüsselung des Handels in "Gesamt", "Ausland" und "Übersee" an, wobei der Wert für "Ausland" jenen für "Übersee" einschließt und "Gesamt" wiederum beide Werte in sich vereint
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, mostra dei subtotali per il commercio: totale, estero, ed oltremare. Quello estero include quello d'oltremare, e quello totale include entrambi.
TEXT.Spanish: Activar esta opción muestra detalles para el comercio: total, exterior y ultramar. Cada valor incluye a los anteriores.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.French: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.German: Zeigt an, in wie vielen Runden eine Stadt einen Bürger verliert, falls ihre Bevölkerung schrumpft
TEXT.Italian: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.Spanish: Muestra cuántos turnos faltan para que una ciudad pierda población.

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights the area of tiles controlled by the selected city, similar to when you select a Settler.
TEXT.German: Hebt die von der gewählten Stadt bearbeitbaren Geländefelder hervor (ähnlich wie bei Auswahl eines Siedlers)

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights each tile controlled by the selected city using a color based on whether it's being worked and your ability to improve it.
TEXT.German: Hebt die von der gewählten Stadt bearbeitbaren Geländefelder mit farbigen Markierungen hervor, abhängig von der tatsächlichen Bewirtschaftung und den Möglichkeiten zur Modernisierung

TEXT.English: When checked, highlights tiles being worked that have already been improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und schon modernisiert wurden

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that have already been improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that have already been improved.
When checked, highlights tiles being worked that can be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und noch modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that can be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that can be improved.
When checked, highlights tiles being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und modernisiert werden können, um einen Bonus zu erhalten

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
When checked, highlights tiles being worked that cannot be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die bearbeitet werden und nicht modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles being worked that cannot be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles being worked that cannot be improved.
When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that have already been improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und schon modernisiert wurden

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that have already been improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that have already been improved.
When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that can be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und noch modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that can be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that can be improved.
When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und modernisiert werden können, um einen Bonus zu erhalten

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that can be improved to provide a bonus.
When checked, highlights tiles not being worked that cannot be improved.
TEXT.German: Hebt Geländefelder hervor, die nicht bearbeitet werden und nicht modernisiert werden können

TEXT.English: Highlight colour of tiles not being worked that cannot be improved.
Highlight colour alpha value of tiles not being worked that cannot be improved.
When checked, selecting units with the [Shift] key will only ever add a single unit at a time.
When checked, automatic unit selection happens instantly rather than with a delay.
When checked, units ordered to heal will awaken when they spot danger, acting like sentries.

When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.
TEXT.French: When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.
TEXT.German: Falls die Option "Wache bei Heilung" gewählt wurde, werden Einheiten nur bei Gefahr aktiv, wenn sie sich in neutralem Gebiet befinden (verhindert beispielsweise, dass sich heilende Einheiten während eines Angriffs auf eine feindliche Stadt oder verteidigende Einheiten in befreundetem Gebiet jede Runde wieder aktiv werden)
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, se è stata abilitata l'opzione 'Sentinella durante la guarigione', le Unità che hanno ricevuto l'ordine di curarsi si riattiveranno quando avvertono un pericolo solamente se si trovano in territorio neutrale. Ciò vi eviterà alle vostre forze d'attacco di attivarsi ogni turno in prossimità di una Città nemica ed alle vostre forze di difesa di riattivarsi in territorio nemico.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.

TEXT.English: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.
TEXT.French: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.
TEXT.German: Stoppt Bautrupps, die die Aktion "Wald abholzen" ausführen, 1 Runde, bevor die Aktion beendet wird, und lässt sie auf einen weiteren Befehl warten
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, i Lavoratori a cui è stato ordinato di tagliare una Foresta si fermeranno quando mancherà un turno al completamento dell'incarico. Per terminare il disboscamento è necessario impartire nuovamente l'ordine.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.

TEXT.English: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.
TEXT.French: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.
TEXT.German: Stoppt Bautrupps, die eine Modernisierung auf einem Wald-Geländefeld errichten und diesen damit entfernen würden, 1 Runde, bevor die Aktion beendet wird, und lässt sie auf einen weiteren Befehl warten
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, i Lavoratori a cui è stato ordinato di tagliare una Foresta e successivamente costruire un miglioramento si fermeranno quando mancherà un turno al completamento dell'incarico. Per terminare la costruzione è necessario impartire nuovamente l'ordine.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.

TEXT.English: When checked, barbarian units adjacent to your borders will not trigger a warning if they cannot enter.
TEXT.German: Lässt keine Warnung erscheinen, wenn sich Barbaren nahe der eigenen Grenzen befinden, diese aber nicht überqueren können

TEXT.English: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.French: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die tatsächlichen Erträge von [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], ICON_GREATPEOPLE] und [ICON_DEFENSE] an, die ein Gebäude für eine Stadt erzeugt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein Gebäudesymbol bewegt wird
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nel testo a comparsa degli Edifici della Città viene mostrata la resa effettiva in [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] e [ICON_DEFENSE] prodotta dagli edifici stessi.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.

TEXT.English: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip jeder Einkommensart eine Zwischensumme (Gesamtertrag vor Modifikatoren) an, falls dies erforderlich ist
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nel testo a comparsa di ogni tipo di Commercio viene mostrato (quando necessario) il relativo subtotale (il totale prima dei modificatori).
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.
TEXT.German: Zeigt im Tooltip die [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]/Runde für jede einzelne Art Große Persönlichkeit an
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, nel testo a comparsa di ogni tipo di Grande Personaggio viene mostrato il tasso individuale di [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] per turno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] the specialist will produce for the city are displayed in the specialist hover text.
When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_COMMERCE]/Runde, [ICON_GOLD]/Runde, [ICON_RESEARCH]/Runde, [ICON_CULTURE]/Runde und [ICON_ESPIONAGE]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la crescita commerciale ([ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD]), scientifica ([ICON_RESEARCH]), culturale ([ICON_CULTURE]) e spionistica ([ICON_ESPIONAGE]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_DEFENSE] einer Stadt und ihren Schutz gegen Bomabardierungen haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la natalità dei Grandi Personaggi ([ICON_DEFENSE]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_FOOD]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la crescita alimentare ([ICON_FOOD]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la natalità dei Grandi Personaggi ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_HAPPY]/Runde und [ICON_UNHAPPY]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano il gradimento ([ICON_HAPPY] e [ICON_UNHAPPY]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_HEALTHY]/Runde und [ICON_UNHEALTHY]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la situazione sanitaria ([ICON_HEALTHY] e [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf [ICON_PRODUCTION]/Runde haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano la produzione ([ICON_PRODUCTION]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.
TEXT.French: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.
TEXT.German: Zeigt die Gebäude an, die Einfluss auf die Unterhaltskosten ([ICON_GOLD]) haben und welchen genau
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, vengono visualizzati gli edifici che influenzano il mantenimento ([ICON_GOLD]) e l'ammontare con cui lo fanno.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, the plot co-ordinates are shown when hovering over a plot once you have centred the map.

When checked, hovering over a plot that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a plot that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein Geländefeld mit teilweise fertig gestellten Bauten (Modernisierungen, Straßen und Waldrodungen) bewegt wird, an, wie viele Runden ein Bautrupp noch benötigt, um sie fertig zu stellen, wenn der Bautrupp diese Aktionen beherrscht
TEXT.Italian: Quando è selezionato, posizionare il cursore su una casella che contiene costruzioni (miglioramenti, strade, eccetera) parzialmente completate mostrerà quanti turni di lavoro sono necessari per completare l'opera.
TEXT.Spanish: Dejar el ratón sobre una casilla con mejoras no terminadas mostarará el número de turnos necesarios para terminar.

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein eigenes Geländefeld bewegt wird, die Modernisierungen oder Straßen an, die ein automatisierter Bautrupp errichten würde
TEXT.Italian: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hovering over a tile you own shows the improvement or route an automated worker would build.

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.
TEXT.French: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.
TEXT.German: Zeigt, wenn der Mauszeiger über ein Geländefeld im Bereich mehrerer Städte bewegt wird, an, welche Stadt es kontrolliert (erscheint in Cyan, falls es auch bearbeitet wird)
TEXT.Italian: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.
TEXT.Spanish: When checked, hovering over a tile your team owns shows which city controls it, in cyan if it is being worked.

TEXT.English: Adds debugging statements into the python log
Eat the cityBuilt and BeginGameTurn events to suppress popups
Refortify city troops when autoplay finishes
Check with the user when a player dies
Default number of turns in autoplay dialog
Adds debugging statements into the python log
Whether the strategy layer should be enabled
Whether the strategy layer dot map should be displayed
Whether the strategy layer should draw dots in the centre
Icon to use for the dot from PlotStyles enum values
Percentage brightness of the overlay dotmaps
Percentage hightlight brightness of the overlay dotmaps
Troops automated to pillage will enter barbarian territory and will pillage barbarian settlements
Troops automated to pillage will ignore enemy units and may enter dangerous situations
Units with Border Patrol automation will not leave friendly territory for any reason
Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to rebase into more offensive positions
Automated Strike Craft will be allowed to intercept potiental enemy aircraft
Select the type of background you would like to use.
Use Vincent's build list in the city screen
Use a civs colour in text related to that civ
Display a bar showing the GP most likely to be created next and their progress
Display movies, such as Word Wonders, in full screen mode
Panels displayed have a semi-transparent background
